vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.11;
son of: Agee (H0089)
§ Shamma = "desert"
an Asherite, son of Zophar
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Sofah; tribu de Aser
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
珊瑪 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "沙漠"
亞設人, 瑣法的兒子 (代上 7:37)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
珊玛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "沙漠"
亚设人, 琐法的儿子 (代上 7:37)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.37;
son of: Zophah (H6690);
brother of: Suah (H5477), Harnepher (H2774), Shual (H7777B), Beri (H1275), Imrah (H3236), Bezer (H1221H), Hod (H1936), Shilshah (H8030), Ithran (H3506H) and Beera (H0878)
§ Shamma = "desert"
an Asherite, son of Zophar
